channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MI

item.description:
Report X-2023110312

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-02

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0

item.title: Report X-2023101040
item.description:
Report X-2023101040

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-16T18:13:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-12
  • City: GRAND RAPIDS
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: WET UNMARKED BOX WAS PUT IN A HAZMAT TOTE AND BROUGHT IT OVER FOR INSPECTION. UPON INSPECTION IT WAS FOUND TO BE A DAMAGED HAZMAT AND THE HAZMAT PROCESS WAS STARTED. DescribePack: CAN HAS A SMALL DENT AND PUNCTURE HOLE IN THE CORNER OF THE SIDEWALL CAUSING IT TO LEAK. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: CAN WAS TURNED ON THE SIDE TO AVOID THE PRODUCT COMING IN CONTACT WITH THE PUNCTURE HOLE.

item.title: Report X-2023100964
item.description:
Report X-2023100964

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-16T18:13:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-10
  • City: SALINE
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: We received one 5-gallon bucket of acetic acid with some slight leakage from underneath the lid. QA was notified when damage was discovered, and the item was placed in a plastic bag and bin. DescribePack: light amount of leakage from under the lid DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: QA was notified when damage was discovered, and the item was placed in a plastic bag and bin.

item.title: Report X-2023100958
item.description:
Report X-2023100958

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-16T18:13:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-10
  • City: PORTAGE
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Hazmat was found in a trailer during the unload process. Hazmat was found with liquid around the lid. Hazmat was taking by QA and placed in a red hazmat tote and then taken to the Hazmat cage. Upon inspection it was found that the lid had a bad seal for the lid causing the leakage. DescribePack: Seal inside lid was not working properly. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Immediately taken to Hazmat cage upon locating the hazmat.

item.title: Report X-2023100887
item.description:
Report X-2023100887

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-14T18:12:23+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-04
  • City: SALINE
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Leaking package containing flammable/corrosive liquid arrived at sort facility. Package was placed in plastic bags and drum and held for QA inspection. One metal drum with a loose top was packed into a box too large for the item, with only a few styrofoam peanuts inside to protect the contents. DescribePack: 1 loose top DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in plastic bags and drum and held for QA inspection.

item.title: Report X-2023100666
item.description:
Report X-2023100666

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-14T18:12:23+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-04
  • City: SALINE
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Leaking drum of ethanol arrived at station with cellophane wrapped around the bottom. Further investigation found that the cellophane was covering up a small puncture hole near the bottom of the drum. The package was placed in a plastic bin and taken to QA for inspection when it arrived at the terminal. DescribePack: 1 small puncture hole near the bottom of the drum. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The package was placed in a plastic bag/bin and taken to QA for inspection when damage was discovered.

item.title: Report X-2023100736
item.description:
Report X-2023100736

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-13T18:12:55+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-09
  • City: YPSILANTI
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RMP NOTICED A WET HAZMAT PACKAGE. EMPLOYEES WERE INSTRUCTED TO NOT TOUCH THE PACAKAGE AND TO LEAVE THE AREA AROUND THE PACKAGE. RESPONDER WAS NOTIFIED. RESPONDER APPROACHES IN FULL PPE WITH DT IN HAND. RESPONDER FOLLOWED THE APROPRIATE RESPONSE SHEET AND CLEANED UP THE SPILL. THE PACKAGE IS THEN SAFELY TRANSPORTED TO THE DMP AREA FOR FURTHER PROCESSING.
